MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL15 postcode area of Ruthin, affecting properties in Llanelidan and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of additional resources required to complete repairs to a grounded overhead cable. Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:25pm on 12th April 2021.
